column4: can someone help me? i can only log in using gnome failsafe mode

i fiddled with my xorg.conf and installed a few different window managers
Crap. Do you have a live CD?

dwm, wmii, blackbox, i used gnome-settings-daemon to change blackbox to default
nope, still have to boot in failsafe-gnome
Though I'm really at a lose for what to do. :S

i click on the keys to make changes, but no dialog comes up asking me for a password
